name: 2023: A Seed Odyssey
description:
2023: A Seed Odyssey is a Global Game Jam game made in 48h

https://globalgamejam.org/2023/games/2023-seed-odyssey-0

Presentation

Earthia, a living planet is slowly dying due to a lack of resources caused by its inhabitants. Its only hope, send its seeds across space using its millenium roots in order to colonize other planets and aborb their resources. Until when will it last ? It's up to you to decide.

Gameplay

blabla

Controls

Only the mouse is used in our game!
